metadata.summary: Configure cloud-to-cloud adapter to ingest logs from Google Cloud Storage buckets into LimaCharlie
metadata.primary_use_case: Ingest security logs and telemetry stored in GCS buckets for processing in LimaCharlie

extracted_apis.description: Configure GCS adapter with bucket, credentials, and client options
Specify the GCS bucket name for log storage
Reference to hive secret containing GCP service account credentials
Optional path prefix to filter logs by directory structure
Number of parallel downloads for log processing
Boolean to enable continuous processing mode

cross_refs.description: GCS adapter can be used as one of two methods to ingest Google Workspace audit logs
Tutorial demonstrates GCP log ingestion using Pubsub, but GCS is an alternative approach
